definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: ash-heap(?), refuse-heap, dung-hill (prob. orig. fire-place stones, cf. Ar. sub √) ;—´[[א]]: abs. as beggars’ resting-place 1Sa 2:8 = Ps 113:7 (both ‖[[עָפָר ]]; cf. Job 2:8 Wetzst: ap. De); so pl, [[אַשׁפַתּוֹת]] La 4:5; [[שַׁעַר הָאַשְׁפּׂת]] Ne 2:13, Ne 3:14, Ne 12:31 = [[הָֽשְׁפוֹת]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ne 3:13 (Ges:§ 35 d).
